mutants.code:
import re

def is_contained(str_1, str_2):
    str_1 = str_1.lower().strip()
    str_2 = str_2.lower().strip()
    str_1 = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', str_1)
    str_2 = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', str_2)
    return str_1 not in str_2

import re

def is_contained(str_1, str_2):
    str_1 = str_1.lower().strip()
    str_2 = str_2.lower().strip()
    str_1 = re.sub('', '', str_1)
    str_2 = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', str_2)
    return str_1 in str_2

import re

def is_contained(str_1, str_2):
    str_1 = str_1.lower().strip()
    str_2 = str_2.lower().strip()
    str_1 = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', str_1)
    str_2 = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', str_2)
    return str_1 in str_2

import re

def is_contained(str_1, str_2):
    str_1 = str_1.lower().strip()
    str_2 = str_2.lower().strip()
    str_1 = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', str_1)
    str_2 = re.sub('', '', str_2)
    return str_1 in str_2

import re

def is_contained(str_1, str_2):
    str_1 = str_1.lower().strip()
    str_2 = str_2.lower().strip()
    str_1 = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', '', str_1)
    str_2 = re.sub('[^\\w\\s]', 'MUTATED', str_2)
    return str_1 in str_2
